mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `day`,`mid`, `uid`, `ruleId`, `num`,`remark`, `pomodoroTime`, `conditionId`, `createdAt`,`updatedAt` FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND day BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} and type=0
SELECT `id`, `day`,`mid`, `uid` `ruleId`, `num`, `pomodoroTime`, `conditionId`, `createdAt`,`updatedAt` FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND day = #{day} AND ruleId = #{ruleId} and type=0
SELECT count(distinct day) as c FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} and type=0
SELECT count(DISTINCT day) as c FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} and type=0
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(day,'%Y-%m-%d') as day FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} and type=0 AND day BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW() ,'%Y-%m-01') AND CURDATE() GROUP BY day
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(day,'%Y-%m-%d') as day FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} and type=0 AND DATE_FORMAT(day, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} GROUP BY day

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(day, '%Y-%m-%d') as day, num, name, icon, iconType FROM ( SELECT t1.day, t1.num, t2.name, t2.icon, t2.iconType, @row_num := IF(@prev_day = t1.day, @row_num + 1, 1) AS row_num, @prev_day := t1.day FROM member_point_logs t1 JOIN member_rules t2 ON t1.ruleId = t2.id JOIN (SELECT @row_num := 0, @prev_day := NULL) vars WHERE t1.mid = #{mid} AND t2.mid = #{mid} AND t1.type=0 ORDER BY t1.day DESC, t1.num DESC ) ranked_logs WHERE
row_num <= 4 ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT count(1) as c FROM ( SELECT @row_num := IF(@prev_day = t1.day, @row_num + 1, 1) AS row_num, @prev_day := t1.day FROM member_point_logs t1 JOIN member_rules t2 ON t1.ruleId = t2.id JOIN (SELECT @row_num := 0, @prev_day := NULL) vars WHERE t1.mid = #{mid} AND t2.mid = #{mid} AND t1.type=0 ORDER BY t1.day DESC, t1.num DESC ) ranked_logs WHERE row_num <= 4

SELECT ruleId, DATE_FORMAT(day, '%w') as weekday, SUM(num) as totalNum FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND type = 0 AND num !=0 AND day BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY ruleId, DATE_FORMAT(day, '%w')

SELECT `id`, `day`,`mid`, `uid`, `ruleId`, `num`, `createdAt`,`updatedAt` FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND ruleId = #{ruleId} AND DATE(day) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND type = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT `id`, `day`,`mid`, `uid`, `ruleId`, `num`, `createdAt`,`updatedAt` FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND ruleId = #{ruleId} AND DATE(createdAt) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND type = 0 LIMIT 1
SELECT `id`, `day`, `mid`, `uid`, `ruleId`, `num`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt` FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND ruleId = #{ruleId} AND type = 0 AND num != 0 ORDER BY day DESC
SELECT sum(num) as c FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND ruleId = #{ruleId} and type=0
SELECT count(1) as c FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND ruleId = #{ruleId} and type=0 and num !=0
SELECT day, sum(num) as num FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND type = 0 AND day BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} GROUP BY day ORDER BY day ASC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(day, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_date, count(1) as value FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND type = 0 AND YEAR(day) = #{year} group by day ORDER BY day ASC

SELECT r.name as name, SUM(l.num) as value FROM member_point_logs l JOIN member_rules r ON l.ruleId = r.id WHERE l.mid = #{mid} AND l.type = 0 AND DATE(l.day) = DATE(#{day}) GROUP BY l.ruleId, r.name ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(day, '%Y-%m') as month, SUM(CASE WHEN num > 0 THEN num ELSE 0 END) as increase, SUM(CASE WHEN num < 0 THEN ABS(num) ELSE 0 END) as decrease FROM member_point_logs WHERE mid = #{mid} AND day BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(day, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT r.name as name, COUNT(*) as count FROM member_point_logs l JOIN member_rules r ON l.ruleId = r.id WHERE l.mid = #{mid} AND l.type = 0 AND l.day BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY l.ruleId, r.name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT CASE WHEN r.type IS NULL OR r.type = '' THEN r.name ELSE r.type END as name, SUM(l.num) as value FROM member_point_logs l JOIN member_rules r ON l.ruleId = r.id WHERE l.mid = #{mid} AND l.type = 0 AND l.day BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY CASE WHEN r.type IS NULL OR r.type = '' THEN r.name ELSE r.type END ORDER BY value DESC
